text.p: Each day, your purpose aligns with one of the Old Gods. Choose one of the Old Gods' boon options after you complete a rest; you gain its benefits until you complete your next rest.

list.li: Odin. You regain 1d4 HP every time you kill an enemy. FREYA: You gain a luck token if you don't have one. Each time you use a luck token, add 1d6 to your roll. LOKI: You have advantage on checks to lie, sneak, and hide.
